attributes.action: ensure every pregnant woman in the UK is offered a reliable test for the Group B Strep bacteria
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Pregnancy & birth magazine and the Group B Strep Support charity want every
woman in the UK to be offered a sensitive test for group B Streptococcus (GBS)
at 35-37 weeks of pregnancy on the NHS. We also want every pregnant woman to be
given accurate information about GBS as a routine part of her antenatal care.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "ensure every pregnant woman in the UK is offered a reliable test for the Group B Strep bacteria."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14453.asp

Prime Minister's Office

You recently signed the e-petition 'groupbstrep'.  

Please find attached a link to an updated response from the Secretary of State of Health, the Rt Hon Alan Johnson MP. 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14900.asp

Prime Minister's Office
